name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with over 9 years of progressive experience in **Master Data Management**, **Data Governance**, and **Data Integration**. Proficient in **SQL**, **Oracle Fusion Cloud**, and **Oracle E-Business Suite**, I excel in **Data Warehouse** development, **Data Validation**, and **Data Transformation**. My expertise includes delivering high-quality **Reporting** and ensuring **Data Quality** through meticulous **Data Mapping** strategies. Proven track record of employing **Agile PLM** methodologies and **Salesforce CRM** to enhance project outcomes. As a mentor to junior engineers, I prioritize user experience and performance, while effectively leading cross-functional teams to innovate and drive technical excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
• Implemented **Master Data Management** strategies to ensure data quality and integrity across systems.
• Developed and maintained **Data Integration** processes, ensuring seamless data flow between **Oracle Fusion Cloud**, **Oracle E-Business Suite**, and other applications.
• Conducted **Data Governance** initiatives, enhancing **Data Quality** through effective **Data Validation**, **Data Mapping**, and **Data Transformation** techniques.
• Leveraged SQL for data extraction and manipulation, optimizing queries for **Oracle**, **MySQL**, and **PostgreSQL** databases.
• Collaborated in Agile teams to deliver robust data solutions, adhering to **Agile PLM** methodologies and best practices.
• Generated comprehensive reports, utilizing tools to analyze and present data for stakeholders, ensuring effective decision-making.
• Performed **Root-Cause Analysis** to identify and resolve data-related issues, improving data management processes.
• Utilized **Salesforce CRM** for managing customer data and enhancing data reporting capabilities.
• Optimized **Data Warehouse** architecture, leading to a **15%** increase in query performance.
• Employed advanced techniques in data handling using core concepts of **Java**, including **Multithreading**, **Concurrency**, and **Collections**, to enhance application efficiency.

• Delivered high-quality Master Data Management solutions by ensuring effective **Data Governance** and **Data Integration** strategies.
• Utilized **SQL** for efficient data validation, data mapping, and data transformation processes, ensuring data quality across platforms.
• Collaborated on **Oracle Fusion Cloud** and **Oracle E-Business Suite** integrations, enhancing operational efficiency with a focus on data warehouse initiatives.
• Employed Agile methodologies for project management, enabling timely reporting and root-cause analysis on data-related issues.
• Developed robust data transformation frameworks that affected over **1000** data sets, improving overall data accuracy by **15%**.
• Assisted in implementing solutions for **Agile PLM** and **Salesforce CRM**, contributing to streamlined business processes.
• Analyzed and validated data quality standards, resulting in a **30%** reduction in data discrepancies.
• Conducted comprehensive reporting on data integrity, facilitating informed decision-making for stakeholders using advanced analytics tools.
• Maintained effective communication in English and German to cater to diverse project teams and client requirements.

• Led efforts in **Master Data Management** to ensure consistent data across systems, improving data accuracy by **30%**.  
• Implemented **Data Governance** strategies that enhanced compliance and reduced data risks by **25%**.  
• Designed and executed **Data Integration** processes, eliminating data silos and achieving real-time data updates across **5** major applications.  
• Developed complex **SQL** queries to retrieve and manipulate large datasets, optimizing performance by **40%** through effective indexing and query tuning.  
• Leveraged **Oracle Fusion Cloud** and **Oracle E-Business Suite** for seamless data migration and integration, successfully completing projects on time and within budget.  
• Participated in agile methodologies to drive **Data Warehouse** development projects, ensuring timely delivery of reporting solutions.  
• Conducted **Data Validation** and **Data Mapping** tasks with great attention to detail, significantly improving data quality metrics by **20%**.  
• Executed **Data Transformation** processes that enabled effective data analysis and reporting, enhancing decision-making capabilities.  
• Collaborated with team members in **Root-Cause Analysis** for data discrepancies, resolving issues and preventing future occurrences.  
• Communicated effectively in **English** and **German**, bridging language barriers within diverse project teams.
